31 Allen Street, west side, between Canal and Hester Streets.
April 8, 1928.

P.L. Sperr.

An aerial view of Allen Street, east side, north from Canal Street,
August 9, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(1) Canal Street, north side, west from but not including Allen Street. May 9, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from a different angle. May 9, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) A view showing in the foreground the frontage from Allen (right) to Eldridge (left) Streets. Note to the upper left the roof of P.S. No. 65 extending thru from Eldridge to Forsyth Street, between Canal and Hester Streets. For further views from this vantage point see the general view files under the No. 54-58 Canal Street, a 12 story building at the S.W. corner of Orchard Street.

P. L. Sperr.

(1) Canal Street, north side, west from but not including Allen Street. May 9, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from a different angle. May 9, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) A view showing in the foreground the frontage from Allen (right) to Eldridge (left) Streets. Note to the upper left the roof of P.S. No. 65 extending thru from Eldridge to Forsyth Street, between Canal and Hester Streets. For further views from this vantage point see the general view files under the No. 54-58 Canal Street, a 12 story building at the S.W. corner of Orchard Street.

P. L. Sperr.

(1) Canal Street, north side, west from but not including Allen Street. May 9, 1930.

(3) A view showing in the foreground the frontage from Allen (right) to Eldridge (left) Streets. Note to the upper left the roof of P.S. For further views from this vantage point see the general view files under the No. 54-58 Canal Street, a 12 story building at the S.W. corner of Orchard Street.

P. L. Sperr.

Allen Street, east side, north from Canal Street, showing work being done on widening the street.

January 20, 1932.

P.L. Sperr.

The park in the center of Allen Street, looking north from Canal Street.
September 22, 1933.

P.L. Sperr.

Allen Street, east side, north from Canal Street. Note the trees in plots on the left, dividing the traffic lanes. The Chrysler Building looms up in the far distance.

May 14, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

Baked sweet potato peddler, at Allen and Canal Streets.

September 25, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Food - Refreshments - Sweet potatoes.
